Use the _config.yml to specify the rules for generating pages like this one (including name and template).

In the template, you have access to all the fields defined in data for the record, like, for instance:

Date,Company,Location,Title,Summary,Responsibilities,Skills,Min_Qualifications,Preferred_Qualifications

  • Senior Designer User Experience
  • As a Sr. Designer, you'll be asked to do more than just create design comps, interactions and specs (though you'll have to do a lot of that!). You'll also be asked to lead teams of other user experience pros, product managers, and business managers to conceptualize and deliver amazing solutions to complex and shifting problems. You'll support your recommendations with competitive audits and research. And, because all good design is iterative, you'll be eager to present your concepts for constant internal and partner review and critique.
Additionally, you also have access to page.name, which is the filename of the page, that is: index.html.
